entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify handling of RMW intrinsics in LSRA #104842
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify `emitIns_Mov` code when emitting RMW intrinsics #104841
    9.0.0
  • mono is failing to build on arm64 macOS #104839
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - In the importer, always `ConvertToMask` on SVE APIs that require a mask. #104836
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Fix alphabetical order of APIs #104834
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove newlines in `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.cs` #104833
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests3.WithDllImportInMainAssembly test timeout (30000ms exceeded) #104830
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] emcc failure to compile aot-instances #104827
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] Failed trying to read log messages via selenium: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: An unknown exception was encountered sending an HTTP request to the remote WebDriver server for URL #104825
  • [6.0] Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests failing to access a symlink used by PhysicalFilesWatcher #104823
  • ICorDebugRegisterSet.GetThreadContext fails on macOS arm64 #104816
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Missing test coverage for invalid immediate #104809
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<char> overload for WebUtility.HtmlEncode. #104808
  • WPF control is not reclaimed on NET9 by GC #104807
  • ARM64-SVE: Separate operand and mask generation in test templates #104804
    Future
  • [WASI] fix event loop init #104803
    9.0.0
  • LoggerMessage generator fails with primary constructor logger, if the logger is used elsewhere #104801
    9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Turn on "V" in zlib-ng compilation #104799
    Future
  • RFE: Add support for using system version of the llvm-libunwind library #104796
    Future
  • RFE: Add support for using system version of the LinuxTracepoints library #104795
    Future
  • Setup cleanup task on jit-format workflow #104794
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #104790
    9.0.0
  • Cross compilation not working on ARM64 machines #104788
  • [WASI][Mono AOT] System.Collections.Specialized.Tests #104786
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows 4.7.0 package too large #104785
  • Irregular tag name of version v9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 #104784
  • [H/3] Distributed Tracing / Telemetry #104783
    10.0.0
  • 'openssl/engine.h' not found on RHEL10 #104775
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASI SDK 23 #104773
    10.0.0
  • javascript calling a method with return Task type in .net 9.0 preview6, the returned promise is always in pending state #104772
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_BadExe(useShellExecute: False) #104770
  • Improve AppHost to display the startup exceptions (such as assembly dependency error) #104768

Closed

  • Obsoletions with a DiagnosticId still get warnings in generated code #101738
    10.0.0
  • Linker doesn't trim substituted `static readonly` fields when consumed directly #82821
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #103754
    9.0.0
  • aspnet app crash with core dump when using 7.0.11-bookworm-slim docker image (debian 12) #93205
    Future
  • ILLink handling of `Type.GetType` doesn't resolve types from corelib #103906
    9.0.0
  • Type.GetType("TypeName") will pick the "first" such type found #98955
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet Android broken debugging (and runtime?) #104265
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json serialization callbacks not supported by collection types #71945
    Future
  • Socket.ConnectAsync(EndPoint, CT) does not pass CT to DNS query, enabling code with many concurrent connections to the same DNS name to reach a state where no further connections get established because all DNS queries time out #92054
    9.0.0
  • Error in blazor 8 intective auto mode #104814
  • F# program fails with an unprintable exception when `FSharp.Core` is not referenced. #104528
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.CancelSendPingAsync fails on osx.1200.amd64.open #104574
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.WinHttpHandlerTest.SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #96481
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTlsResumeTests failing #103354
    9.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.cmd test failure #101759
    9.0.0
  • SSL Stress Connection Refused Linux #93204
    9.0.0
  • GC root enumerating crashing with BULK_WRITEBARRIER helper on the stack #101890
    9.0.0
  • DotNet MAUI with .Net 7 fails to open Websocket in Android Foreground Service #93226
  • nativeruntimeeventsource test fails due to missing metadata #90021
    9.0.0
  • DisableBitTests.EnabledThroughFeatureSwitch/DisabledAlwaysInBrowser failures #103683
  • Random SIGSEGVs after porting from Xamarin to net8-android #98933
  • Test failure: System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.MetricsTest.DurationHistogram_HasBucketSizeHints #104769
  • JIT: Optimize "x == a && y == b" #104767
  • JIT doesn't allow method prologues to have more than one instruction group #104585
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/2 request doesn't report the correct reason why request ends on connection GOAWAY #97128
    9.0.0
  • Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM. #81093
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #103429

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [cdac] Update thread contract doc to align with implementation and other contract docs #104832
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations perform nullcheck #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104828
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper code until we know it's needed #104819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104818
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute #104813
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make OpenSSL ENGINE support light up #104810
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Remove "nuget.org" references in WBT #104806
    Security, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid strength reducing IVs that are live out of a loop #104800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use SyncTextWriter on WASI either #104798
    area-System.IO, os-wasi
  • [HTTP/3] Add null check in case we can't get H/3 inboundControlStream #104797
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #104793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Add a buffer to `FileWriter` and add a `--parallelism` option to superpmi.py #104789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend usage of GC_ALLOC_ALIGN8 #104781
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove GTF_BOOLEAN #104779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable fixed disabled System.Text.Json tests #104771
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Turn off "V" in zlib-ng compilation #104776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Make build.ps1 default to the OS architecture #104792
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.8
  • [release/8.0 staging] Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat Version #104722
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove FEATURE_SET_FLAGS, clean up arm32 flags #104778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104330
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Document arm `PreferredMachine` settings #104812
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix zlib-ng build failure caught in the sdk CI #104750
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore type resolution failures when checking for attributes in `StackTrace.ToString`. #104530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing cancellation throw in SendPingAsync path #104780
    area-System.Net
  • Turn off USE_REGIONS for sunos and illumos #104301
    area-GC-coreclr, area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix WinHttp SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #104774
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Clean up procfs.h mess on sunos and illumos #104304
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix minification #104787
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Replace Ubuntu 18 images with Ubuntu 20 in ARM 64 runs #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix issue link for an expected difference in warning behavior #104760
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Uncomment disabled test that has been fixed #104764
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update downlevel Versions.props #104685
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Bump the stj version to avoid error #104751
    area-Build-mono
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Enable DiagnosticsTest for HTTP3 #104641
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some more cleanup to regex NonBacktracking #104766
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Disable SslStress and HttpStress runs #104714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters: fix target framework check for source-build. #104735
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/2] Throw meaningful exception if we get GOAWAY while reading response body #104707
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Delete FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER ifdef #104727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ISOSDACInterface::GetThreadData reading the GC alloc context. #104762
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2493882 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Sve.ScatterXBitYNarrowing() on Arm64 #104720
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104395
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104565
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104755
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104756
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Don't warn for reflection access to compiler-generated code #104757
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `ConvertToSingle`, `ConvertToDouble`; fix `CovertTo*` tests #104478
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Testing OOM in System.Buffers.Tests #104734
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that the correct VC++ toolset is selected in all build environments #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't make web requests in HttpClient trimming test #104718
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix trim warnings for base method implementing interface #104753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update feature switch doc for WinForms feature switches #104673
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question]: why is c++ 11 not installed in the root fs on the linux distros? #2623

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [ppc64le][mono] dotnet tool update -g is failing #41672
  • SDK and runtime compatibility #41893
  • [Bug] Failed to download Cpp2IL #42003
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #41938
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42092
  • Allow dotnet nuget why command to take the project in the current folder as its input #42123
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21456.8]The output content is empty when starting the global tool application dotnet-format #20694
  • Using SDK compiler in torn builds #41791
    9.0.1xx

Updated

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'alpine.3.19-x64' is not recognized. #39733
  • dotnet new command, for project templates, behaves differently between macOS and Linux (Ubuntu) #41644
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
  • Failed to sign apphost error code 1 #41636
    Discussion
  • apicompat --package-assembly-references is difficult to use #41686
  • Enable bundling NativeAOT NuGet packages from runtime on non-vmr builds. #41687
  • Upgrading "aspire" workload causes builds to fail until Visual Studio is restarted #41862
    Backlog
  • Installing DotNet CLI via winget not working - Dotnet CLI missing #41878
    Discussion
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844
  • Installer kills software without asking #41815
  • EnableDynamicLoading causes multiple loading of assemblies at runtime #41805
  • Potential telemetry cleanup logic error - unsent telemetry events buildup #41796
  • Permission Denied or Access Denied when running a global dotnet tool #41947
  • dotnet tool install doesn't respect packageSourceMapping #41871
  • dotnet build leaves lingering dotnet processes on raspberry pi (debian) #41870
  • System.AccessViolationException in build process #41868
  • WindowsBase version conflict between Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App and Microsoft.NETCore.App #41909
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012
  • Checksum links in https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/blob/main/documentation/package-table.md#table fail #42008
  • dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0.7 missing in Fedora 40 & RHEL repo #42063
  • Setting <IsPublishable>false</IsPublishable> should force PublishIISAssets to false. #42048
  • MSBuild SDK support for C++/CLI #42078
    Discussion
  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • dotnet sln add: doesn't add MAUI project for Deploy #42108
  • dotnet clean and build [or dotnet rebuild] as one command #42096
  • AzureDevops pipeline issue when trying to install .NET 8 Sdk #42093

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Erroneous CS0266 on 'byte = byte & byte' #74375
  • Out parameter on Dictionary<TKey, TValue>.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) is flagged by IDE0008 when it shouldn't be #74372
  • constant string allow conversions #74369
  • Autocomplete (Intellisense) doesn't work correctly in project that references another project which has source generated files #74368
  • "Unmerged changes" should use merge markers to mark refactoring conflicts across multiple targets #74366

Closed

  • A test gap in `CheckInvocationArgMixing` method #73550
    17.11
  • Properties with mixed readonly accessors should skip escape checks where possible #35606
    Backlog
  • Performance issue in NET 6 for classes with many properties #66969
  • Consider adjusting wording for `ErrorCode.ERR_NoConvToIDisp` #73559
    17.12
  • Errors for scoped differences in override indexers are missing in some cases #73384
    17.12
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown from FindSymbols.FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #70850
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35111.61 #74365

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert ImplementTypeOptions to editorconfig options #74376
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defender Investigation #74374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74371
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test Lock with .NET 9 runtime #74367
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Switch to STJ for client side LSP serialization #74364
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not use memory mapped files on non-windows #74339
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use more precise wording for errors specifying requirements for types that can be used in a `using` statement. #74311
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify passing around of FAR symbol groups #74358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors refkind differences #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow services to use System.Text.Json for OOP comms in Razor #74280
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid reporting redundant and possibly misleading WRN_InlineArrayNotSupportedByLanguage #74283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Handle span conversions in expression trees #74349
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Convert HideAdvancedMembers option to editorconfig option #74360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • SpillSequenceSpiller – preserve `ref` BoundConditionalOperator in presence of spilling in its either branch #74310
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix debug assert with operation blocks in invalid code #74354
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid project created when name has `&` (ampersand) or ` ` (space) in it #56765
  • API description provider not lifting Container type of properties #56764
  • ApiDescriptionProvider does not return SupportedResponseTypes when using controllers with Results<T> #56763
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.Core.IISHttpContext.ExtraFeatureSet #56762
  • Future of standalone WASM applications #56761
  • Blazor server app slow build time #56759
  • Auth middleware should respond with ProblemDetails #56757
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextSansFilter #56756
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.targets unable to publish when static web assets been removed after build phase #56755
  • Sliding expiry for hybrid cache #56754

Closed

  • Regression: HTTP 401 using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.7 #56727
  • Analyzer to warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56310
    9.0-preview7
  • Question - Where does Visual Studio store https or IIS Express option for a Blazor project? #48074
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.NavigationException:“Exception_WasThrown” #55831
  • Spring 2024 repo health check #55323
  • Add endpoint metadata to disable HTTP metrics #56039
    9.0.0
  • Metadata to exclude request from http.server.request.duration metric #50654
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56739
  • basic Hot Reload fails when modifying razor pages in external library/project #56600
  • Broken localization after "Publish" from resources from the "Shared" library in the Blazor WASM client #56560

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #56766
    area-signalr
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • update tsaconfig #56749
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `34ad51b` to `b4aaf97` #56760
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56631
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview7
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.csproj #56659
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Service does not start if process name is specified in Service attribute #23593
  • CTRL+ALT+L #23591
  • Make Typed `SetBinding()` method generic so that the `BindableProperty` need not be prefixed with the type name #23590
  • SearchBar: Inconsistent behavior - Confusion and request to reopen issue 9092 #23588
  • *.appinstaller - outdated schema #23583
  • SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored when SwipeItem Background color os set. #23581
  • [iOS] Entry not allow to scroll when keyboard is open #23580
  • IWebView.Source has no setter #23579
  • Behavior bindable property with DynamicResource not supported? #23578
  • Workload 8.0.61 breaks Mono interpreter on MacCatalyst. #23577
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 6] SplashScreen icon is randomly left out of the package #23576
  • Gradient never returns to the correct colour #23575
  • Memory Leak When updating <image /> Image Source from View model [Observable Property] using memory Stream. 60 fps Byte[] to the view #23574
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #23573
  • MAUI default project template Windows platform creation completed and running failed #23571
  • MAUI Windows Picker scroll bar doesn't appear when there are 14 items #23570
  • Nunits/Xunits support only .net8.0 and cannot be written specifically for either .net8.0 android or ios #23568
  • Unable to hide NavigationBar #23567

Closed

  • [Windows] No application icon in the titlebar #23572
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL) in tid 25847 (.NET TP Worker) - Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22812
  • MauiSplashScreen when setting the color to #FFFFFF and #FFF #23361

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few more template ampersand cases #23592
    area-templates
  • Make ampersands work *more* in net9-only blazor-solution template #23589
    area-blazor, area-templates

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23585
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #23586
  • [darc] Pin darc version as workaround #23584

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.4.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: block collections over value-converted elements #34218
    9.0.0
  • Nullable PK been mapped to NOT Null during code first migration generating #34216
  • Support bitwise NOT on boolean values #34213
  • Issue occurs when trying to generate query string. #34211

Closed

  • Migration drops non-existent column for model with owned base class but non-owned inherited class #34161
  • Why Unknown error 258 is not in SqlServerRetryingExecutionStrategy retryable error numbers. #34154
  • Nested IExecutionStrategy with IDbContextTransaction #34214
  • IProperty.GetColumnName() does not return the sql column name for complex types? #34215
  • How to add only an incremental migration through IMigrationsScaffolder? #33422
  • Adding duplicate columns when creating a new migration #33152
  • EF forgets how to serialize an enum in a JsonColumn, you have to remind it and the error message is not helpful #33843
  • New Provider: Overriding the generation of bool predicate for short circuiting #33838
  • Query: optimize nested CASE blocks #18774
    9.0.0-preview7
  • Query: optimize CASE statement - remove conditions that are never hit #18935
    9.0.0-preview7
  • Cosmos: projecting collection of distinct ints throws #34009
    9.0.0
  • Precompiled queries #25009
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: WithPartitionKey() is ignored when executing query via ReadItem #34102
    9.0.0
  • Call a ThenBy on a non IOrderedQueryable #34212
  • Allow use of SplitToView on an entity mapped to a table #34070

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement `CASE` flattening optimizations #34175
  • Enable internal runtime downloads via dSAS #34217

Updated

  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Prefer equality in boolean comparisons #34166
  • Stop including the discriminator in the JSON id by default #34208
  • Execute migrations using the ExecutionStrategy #34206
  • Add extension point to Migrate #34199
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #34144
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524
